tool_description: A Climate tech api on climate tech unicorns
title: Climate tech unicorns

api_list.name: Get a specific list of climate tech unicorns
api_list.description: Get a specific list of climate tech unicorns
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-tech-unicorns.p.rapidapi.com/innovators/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-tech-unicorns.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get the list of all climate tech unicorns

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-tech-unicorns.p.rapidapi.com/innovators"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-tech-unicorns.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
